ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Powerleveling Others
ygData.msgSnippet: Had others in my party whacking as well?  Could it be that it only wipes my Damage and not the other party members? Slyde ... From: Windleaf Mistsong
ygData.messageBody:
Had others in my party whacking as well? Could it be that it only wipes my
Damage and not the other party members?

Slyde
-----Original Message-----
From: Windleaf Mistsong [mailto:windleaf@...]
Sent: Wednesday, February 07, 2001 12:39 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com; Eqbards@...
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Powerleveling Others

At 12:22 PM 2/7/01 -0600, Daniel P. Sniderman wrote:
>Has the Mem Blur component been "nerfed"? I tried Power leveling someone
>the other night while camping Gate Potions in Cazic Thule. Fought it down
>to next to nothing charmed it and when Charm Broke the 20'ish Druid
>killed it but didn't get the XP. I thought that was "the Program".
>
>Thanks
>
>Slyde
>Level 53

Worked for me about a week ago. Was travelling through, saw a solo'er in
trouble fighting 2 mobs, hacked the extra down to less than a bubble,
charmed it and had him kill it and he got the exp.

---Windleaf

with the subject submissions.
